predicate.note: Frames file for 'rejuvenate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: He adds that with communism collapsing and Mr. Gorbachev scrambling [*-2] to rejuvenate the Soviet economy , `` Our interest lies in a controlled transformation , a contained nuclear reaction , so we need [*-1] to help him , and not just with words . ''
